Very cool - installation was a breeze.  Double click the file, tell it where to install, all finished.

Even comes with nfsmwres.exe to run in widescreen resolutions.  I think the graphics are maxed out from the start, which is nice.  You don't have to download anything extra for it to work.

Thanks for the great rip!  

There is an HD texture mod you can download for the game but with my original version it crashed a lot.  I don't think I'm going to bother with it again but feel free to check it out and see if it'll work on your machine better than it did mine.
This works so well, thanks for the high resolution mod. Also, this game is way better than the newest most wanted.
